name: Duolingo (blue header, not so bright, etc.)
description:
- blue header
- not so bright colors for the skill icons
- not so bright background (more of a greyish-white)
- streak checkmark in the header (Chrome/Chromium or other webkit browser is recommended)
- somewhat bigger fonts during the lessons
- other minor tweaks and changes

additional_info:
I made this userstyle for myself, I like it this way, but I thought I would share it. Feel free  to use it. 
I'm not a developer, I don't have time to test in various browsers or setups, so if you like it, use it, if don't like it, then don't. No guarantees.
